title: Dragonblade Riven
body: I'm new to this forum type thing so I apologize if I'm doing anything wrong or something. Any help would be appreciated. I'm a fairly new level 30 and I was wondering if anyone could give me their opinion of Riven? I never considered buying her until I got the Dragonblade Riven skin shard from the project loot boxes. Is she difficult to play? Is that even considered a good skin? Is she worth purchasing? Idk. My play style is pretty diverse. I can play any role and enjoy it fairly well. Sorry for being such a noob.

replies.body: It's my favorite skin for her, the particle effects are pretty rad :D

Very good, but also extremely high-skill. Complex kit and a reliance on fast reactions and animation-canceling, she plays more like an adc than a melee champ. This is why you see so many top scrubs playing riven, and typically feeding.
She takes time to learn, but she is pretty pub stompy
Thanks for all the help guys :-) I think I may buy Darius for now and just wait until I'm a bit better and get Riven. I'll be keeping that skin shard though. ;-)
No she really isn't. She's fun for certain people but if you're trying to win a game go literally any other top laner.
